korean: 오랜만에 친구를 만나서 카페에서 수다를 떨었다.
그동안 못 본 사이에 있었던 일들을 이야기했어.
english: I met up with a friend after a long time and chatted at a cafe.
We talked about things that happened while we hadn't seen each other.
We talked for 3 hours without realizing how time passed.
We promised to meet again next time and said goodbye.
